Welcome to my website! I’m Matt.

I’m a Master’s student in Computer Science at UWaterloo (co-advised by Patrick Lam and Gregor Richards). My research interests are in programming languages, compilers, and runtime systems.

I’m also a big fan of music, an avid volleyball player, and a pretty cool guy.

Feel free to check out my resume or reach out to me at matt.dsouza@gmail.com.
